page_content: The page discusses regulations concerning public waters, roads, and forests in the context of land surveying in the Canton of Zurich.
The page provides information on supplementary benefits related to AHV/IV in the Canton of Zurich, including eligibility and application procedures.
The page discusses measures to take in case of energy shortages, including potential restrictions and guidelines for households and businesses.
The page outlines guidelines for calculating the minimum subsistence level in debt enforcement procedures in the Canton of Zurich.
The page discusses a handbook on school quality standards and evaluation methods in the Canton of Zurich.

The page provides comprehensive guidelines on maternity protection, including legal regulations, employment conditions, and health and safety measures for pregnant and nursing employees in the Canton of Zurich.
The page provides guidelines on the tax declaration procedure for both natural and legal persons, including forms and deadlines.
